abstract: The definition of a custom detent with a calculated height.
overview:
## Overview

You can create and use a custom detent with built-in detents.

items.description: Calculates and returns a height based on the context.
items.name: height(in:)

items.description: Information that you can use to calculate the height of a custom detent.
items.name: CustomPresentationDetent.Context

items.description: Sets the available detents for the enclosing sheet.
items.name: presentationDetents(_:)

items.description: Sets the available detents for the enclosing sheet, giving you programmatic control of the currently selected detent.
items.name: presentationDetents(_:selection:)

items.description: Configures the behavior of swipe gestures on a presentation.
items.name: presentationContentInteraction(_:)

items.description: Sets the visibility of the drag indicator on top of a sheet.
items.name: presentationDragIndicator(_:)

items.description: A type that represents a height where a sheet naturally rests.
items.name: PresentationDetent

items.description: A behavior that you can use to influence how a presentation responds to swipe gestures.
items.name: PresentationContentInteraction

title: CustomPresentationDetent
